content:
That's fantastic to hear! Juan sounds like an excellent tutor, and it's great that you're making progress with your Spanish. Having a good tutor can make all the difference in language learning.

It's also wonderful that Juan is sharing insights about Colombian culture and customs with you. Understanding the cultural context is a crucial part of language learning, and it will definitely help you connect with native speakers and appreciate the language more.

Colombian culture is rich and vibrant, and it's amazing that you're getting to experience it firsthand through Juan's stories and anecdotes. You're not only learning the language, but you're also gaining a deeper understanding of the people and their way of life.

Keep up the good work, and don't hesitate to ask Juan more questions about Colombian culture and customs. He's probably happy to share more with you!

By the way, have you tried any Colombian music or watched any Colombian movies/TV shows to supplement your language learning?
